verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* observance \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* victim, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w ordained|strong="H6680"\w*. \w Command|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* unto thee \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w red|strong="H0122"\w* \w cow|strong="H6510"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w full|strong="H8549"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* immolate \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* all:

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* dipping \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* sprinkle \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* door \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*,

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* all, delivering \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fire \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* also \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* twice dyed, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* flame, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w cow|strong="H6510"\w* \w is|strong="H3548"\w* consumed.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w then|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w washing|strong="H7364"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w*, \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* hath \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w her|strong="H5704"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H1320"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cow|strong="H6510"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* pour \w them|strong="H0853"\w* forth without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* most \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* reserved \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* aspersion: \w because|strong="H3240"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cow|strong="H6510"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* burnt \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* carried \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cow|strong="H6510"\w*, hath \w washed|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* observe \w this|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H2930"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* holy thing \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* toucheth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w corpse|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* therefore \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* sprinkled \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* water \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*. \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* sprinkled \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* toucheth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w corpse|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* mixture, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w profane|strong="H2930"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* expiation, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2398"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* mall \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dieth \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*: \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* vessels \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H2063"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w no|strong="H0369"\w* cover, \w nor|strong="H0369"\w* binding \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w corpse|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w grave|strong="H6913"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3627"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* offering, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H3627"\w* pour \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* \w hyssop|strong="H0231"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* sprinkle therewith \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furniture|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* defiled \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w touching|strong="H5060"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w thing|strong="H3627"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* manner \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w purify|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* being expiated \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w until|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* expiated \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* rite, \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* church: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath profaned \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* purification.

\w This|strong="H2708"\w* precept \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. \w He|strong="H5704"\w* also \w that|strong="H4325"\w* sprinkled \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* \w his|strong="H3526"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*. \w Every|strong="H6153"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* expiation, \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

\w Whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* toucheth \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w make|strong="H2930"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*: \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* toucheth \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.
